@alc1218's solution seems to work. Anyways, here are the details of my machine.

Machine: macOS Sierra 10.12.6
Bazel: 0.5.3 with Homebrew
Tensorflow: 1.3 from source using
git clone --recursive https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow
